description: Try our easy to follow Beer-battered Cod & Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beer-battered Cod & Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Season the fish and dust with the cornflour. Dip into the batter until coated, shake off any excess and deep-fry in batches for 7 minutes, using tongs to turn the fish over. Drain on kitchen paper. Keep warm in a low oven. Increase the heat until a cube of bread browns in 15 seconds. Deep-fry the chips again in batches for 2 minutes until crisp and golden. Serve with the fish and mushy peas with lemon wedges on the side.
